2.2 Exchange Variable¶

exchange¶

It can be imaged as a real exchange house; default setting is the first exchange in your strategy’s parameter. all of data interactive with the exchange which achieve through this object function.

exchanges¶

The exchange’s array, it contains multiple exchange objects which are sorted by order of addition . used as exchanges[0] , exchange[1] etc…

Note

If you use exchange directly, which equals to exchanges[0].

Order state¶
